io.github.mountainrange.mule

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mountainrange.mule.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds key information about the state of the game, and drives turns. This is the main controller class for this project, it facilitates most communication between classes in this program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Creates a GameManager object

    • Method Detail

      • pass

        public void pass()
        Passes player turn during land-grab phase for HOTSEAT only. This method is not used in other game modes.

      • incrementTurn

        public void incrementTurn()
        Increments the turn. This method is used in most gamemodes

      • tileOperation

        public void tileOperation(Player player)
        If the selected tile is the town, enter the town menu. Otherwise, attempt to buy the currently selected tile for the given player, or place a MULE.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to perform the action for

      • setLabels

        public void setLabels()
        Update the HUD with the current player's statistics. This is shown in the lower status bar in gameplay.

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        End the current player's turn, begin the next player's turn, and perform any other associated actions.

      • showText

        public void showText(MessageType msg)
        Calls WorldMap to display a normal message.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to display

      • showCustomText

        public void showCustomText(java.lang.String msg)
        Calls WorldMap to display a custom message.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to display

      • showTempText

        public void showTempText(MessageType msg)
        Displays a temporary message.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to display

      • changeFood

        public void changeFood(MessageType msg)
        Apply a food-related event to the current player.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to apply

      • setInAuction

        public void setInAuction(boolean inAuction)
        Sets the auction object this gamemanager will use.

      • scoreGame

        public java.util.Map<Player,java.lang.Integer> scoreGame()
        Compute the score of the given player. The score of a player is computed as follows: money + (plot * 500 + price of outfitting) + mules in store * 35 + (resource * price of resource).
        Returns:
        map of players to their scores

      • calculateTurnOrder

        public void calculateTurnOrder()
        Sort players in ascending order by score (so players with the lowest score go first). turnOrder holds the sorted version of playerList.

      • setGambleFlag

        public void setGambleFlag()
        Sets a global variable indicating the player is going to gamble. This is read by the timer in turnTimer, and causes the turn to end and gives the player the money earned gambling.

      • handleKey

        public void handleKey(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
        Passes keys through to the KeyManager Object See the KeyManager object to see how key events are handled

      • getPlayerList

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayerList()
        Gets the list of players for this session
        Returns:
        the list of players in this GameManager's session

      • getCurrentPlayerNum

        public int getCurrentPlayerNum()
        Gets the number of current players
        Returns:
        the number of players currently in the game

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()

      • getShop

        Returns the shop.

      • tileOperation

        public void tileOperation()
        Attempt to operate on the currently selected tile for the current player.

        Returns:

        public int getPhaseCount()
